title: League ranked
body: Why is fucken league so god damn shit. "We match players by skills". Bull shit. I have been in s4 for the longest time because of dumb asses not feeding and not doing their job. What is so hard to match people by skills and fucking banning dumb asses for being so god damn stupid. I rate this game 0/10. Recommend do not play because you will legit break everything. This game has given me so much fucken stress that I lost chromosomes.

replies.body: Have you considered the fact that maybe your stuck at a rank because your skill is at that level instead of your teammates being bad

> [{quoted}](name=UnboundHades,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XeRKGeQu,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-08-28T05:06:48.078+0000)
>
> Have you considered the fact that maybe your stuck at a rank because your skill is at that level instead of your teammates being bad

Don't you know its NEVER just them? it's ALWAYS someone else's fault EVERY time
